definition: to make a definite diagnosis/confirmed (case of a specific disease)

sentences.english: Finally they were confirmed by DSA or MRI.
sentences.chinese: 後經DSA或MRI確診爲頸動脈海綿竇瘻。

sentences.english: Time of detection greatly effects melanoma's cure rate.
sentences.chinese: 黑素瘤確診的時間早晚極大地影響着治癒的概率。

sentences.english: As of today, nearly 30,000 confirmed cases have been reported in 74 countries.
sentences.chinese: 截至今天，在74個國家已報告了近3萬起確診病例。

sentences.english: Once school-related fears of children was diagnosed, the treatment that given early would achieve better effects.
sentences.chinese: 一旦確診兒童學校恐怖症，早期予以治療則療效較好。

sentences.english: Administer small needle-knife and focal injection to 10 diagnosed trigger fingers.
sentences.chinese: 對10例確診爲彈響指採用小針刀加局注治療。

sentences.english: Mexico has reported 397 confirmed human cases of infection, including 16 deaths.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥報告397名確診病例，包括16名死亡病例。

sentences.english: Diagnosis of acute infection is often missed because the infected person has no symtoms.
sentences.chinese: 由於被感染者無症狀，對急性感染經常無法及時確診。

sentences.english: Aortic continuity was achieved by surgical anastomosis of artificial vessel.
sentences.chinese: 確診後做主動脈弓及降主動脈人工血管吻合術。

sentences.english: A "reinfection" was any one diagnosed more than 30 days after the index infection.
sentences.chinese: 再感染是指標感染後確診超過30天。

sentences.english: Diagnosis can usually be made by barium swallow and tracheogram.
sentences.chinese: 確診要靠鋇餐和氣管造影。

sentences.english: The disease has no apparant clinic symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 該病無特異的臨牀症狀，術前極難確診。

sentences.english: Postoperative histopathological examination confirmed 18 cases of gastric ectopic pancreas, and 2 cases of lipomas.
sentences.chinese: 病理組織學檢查後確診異位胰腺18例，脂肪瘤2例。

sentences.english: Confirmed, he will be home to let his wife and daughter to a medical examination.
sentences.chinese: 確診後，他回到家便讓妻女去體檢。

sentences.english: STUDENT: They only studied diagnosed anorexics.
sentences.chinese: 他們只對被確診爲厭食症的人做了實驗。

sentences.english: Shanxi confirmed human avian influenza cases, patients recovered and were discharged today.
sentences.chinese: 山西省確診的人禽流感個案，患者於今日康復出院。

definition: (of a surgeon) to perform an operation/(of a patient) to have an operation/to decapitate/to behead/to single out as a point of attack
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
to confirm (sth to be true)/to verify
to recur (of a disease)/to reappear/to relapse (into a former bad state)
